summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4226 for the improvement of 7th Avenue Northeast, from East 53rd Street to East 55th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50171, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
